transcript: I mean that's that's only a little thing but that's the kind of guys I had. They didn't just die. They killed themselves for each other and I mean that exactly. A little more selfish than they'd still be here today.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, that's-that's only a little thing, but that's the kind of guys I had. They didn't just die. They killed themselves for each other. And I mean that exactly. A little more selfish and they'd still be here today.
